analysis.summary: New York Times reporter Landon Thomas Jr. emails Jeffrey Epstein expressing interest in Saudi political connections involving Al-Waleed and Jared Kushner, while referencing a People.com article about Harvey Weinstein's use of intelligence agencies against accusers and discussing attorney David Boies' legal representation history.
